explains: n. 烘干机；干燥剂，催干剂
wordGroup: hair dryer 电吹风，电风机；吹风机
drum dryer 转鼓式干燥机
hopper dryer 加料斗干燥器
hand dryer 烘手机；干手机
electric hair dryer 电吹风机

sentences.en: What a sweet day it will be when I move into an apartment with a washer and dryer connected.
sentences.cn: 当我搬进一座有洗衣机和烘干机连接着的公寓时，那将是多么甜蜜的一天。

sentences.en: Because one day, someone took clothes from the washer and dryer, and dumped them in the corner.
sentences.cn: 因为有一天，有人把衣服从洗衣机和烘干机里拿了出来，并扔在了角落里。

sentences.en: She then threatened to dump everybody else's clothes she herself found in the washer and dryer.
sentences.cn: 然后她威胁说，要把她自己在洗衣机和烘干机里找到的所有其他人的衣服都扔掉。
